title: Web Share and Open Graph (OG) meta

fields.label: Web Share Text
fields.name: web_share_text
fields.instructions: This text will pre-fill what users say about this content. Limit to 160 characters. Defaults to the "Intro" field for program posts.

fields.label: OG Title
fields.name: og_title
fields.instructions: Will display as the page title in social media posts. Only use if different from the post title.

fields.label: OG Description
fields.name: og_description
fields.instructions: Will display as the content in social media posts and override the generic page meta description. Leave blank to use the SEO page meta description.

fields.label: OG Image
fields.name: og_image
fields.instructions: Will display as the preview image in social media posts. Be sure the media item has Alt Text for screen readers. Recommended image dimensions are 1200 Ã— 628 pixels.

fields.label: Resources
fields.message: Working NYC / Patterns / OG Image Templates | Figma file for OG Image Templates. The file also includes all Working NYC patterns for the creation of new assets. MetaTags.io | Edit and experiment with your content then preview how your webpage will look on Google, Facebook, Twitter and more. This tool can help test out writing content and designing images, illustrating how it will display across platforms. Open Graph .XYZ; Preview and Generate Open Graph Meta | This tool can help preview how meta tags look to each platform in a live site. Facebook OG Debugger | This tool can help debug issues with the display of cards on Facebook. Twitter Card Validator | This tool can help debug issues with the display of Twitter Cards.
